title: Twitter User Geolocation Using a Unified Text and Network Prediction Model
abstract: We propose a label propagation approach to geolocation prediction based on Modified Absorption, with two enhancements:(1) the removal of "celebrity" nodes to increase location homophily and boost tractability; and (2) he incorporation of text-based geolocation priors for test users. Experiments over three Twitter benchmark datasets achieve state-of-the-art results, and demonstrate the effectiveness of the enhancements.
histories: To appear in ACL 2015, Proceedings of the 53rd Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL 2015)
